    Read The Case Of The Missing Television, And Answer The Questions Below

    Kevin Follow Jun 05, 2023 · 2 mins read
    Share this

     




    Answer: 

    MISSING TELEVISION 

    1. According to the case of missing television, the verdict that was given and the amount of the missing television was made to be charged by the employees is agreeable. The reason behind it can be stated that, as per any hotel rules and regulations, search guests are made to check out of the hotel only after the rooms are checked properly. Any missing objects or any damages could be reframed while the guests move out. So, to ensure that prospect, it is necessary to evaluate the hotel rules and the housekeeping people should be responsible for maintaining the standard procedures that could be maintained by both staff and the guest who visits.

    2. The incident can be prevented by hotels in the following ways:

    ● Proper checking while checking in is important as most of the guests should be checked in the entrance by various security professionals.

    ● Recruiting responsible staff members is also necessary as it takes a lot of effort to maintain discipline at work.

    ● Going through the customer’s profile before taking bookings is necessary to evaluate safe staying and maintain hotel reputation.

    ● Before checking out, ensuring standards procedures of clearing the guest room should be carried forwarded to avoid any damages and missing objects in the hotels.
